mapper.insert: INSERT INTO adjustmentFile (employeeID, fileType, fileYear, fileName, fileStatus, filePath) VALUES (#{employeeID}, #{fileType}, #{fileYear}, #{fileName}, #{fileStatus}, #{filePath})
mapper.update: UPDATE adjustmentFile SET fileStatus = #{fileStatus}, filePath=#{filePath}, fileType=#{fileType} WHERE employeeID = #{employeeID} AND fileYear=#{fileYear} AND fileName=#{fileName} AND fileType=#{fileType}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM adjustmentFile WHERE fileType = #{fileType} AND employeeID = #{employeeID} AND fileYear = #{fileYear}
